channel.title: Redis Enterprise compatibility with open source Redis on Redis Documentation Center
channel.description: Recent content in Redis Enterprise compatibility with open source Redis on Redis Documentation Center

item.title: Compatibility with open source Redis configuration settings
item.description: Redis Enterprise Software and Redis Enterprise Cloud only support a subset of open source Redis configuration settings. Using CONFIG GET or CONFIG SET with unsupported configuration settings returns an error. Setting Redis Enterprise Redis Cloud Notes activerehashing ✅ Standard ✅ Active-Active ✅ Standard ✅ Active-Active busy-reply-threshold ✅ Standard ✅ Active-Active ❌ Standard ❌ Active-Active Value must be between 0 and 60000. hash-max-listpack-entries ✅ Standard ✅ Active-Active ✅ Standard ✅ Active-Active hash-max-listpack-value ✅ Standard
